body:
# GitLab - Ubuntu
GitLab-Ubuntu provides installation and packages for GitLab on Ubuntu. Ubuntu _server_ is the intended target, as all instructions are given using the command line, but the scripts should function just the same on a desktop install of Ubuntu. 

## Install Scripts
Until a ```deb``` package can be created, the install script under ```source/install-stable.sh``` must be used. 

## Supported Versions 
#### GitLab
Tested with version 3.03 www.gitlabhq.com

#### Ubuntu
Tested with __Ubuntu Server 12.04.1 LTS x86_64__
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Installation and support for GitLab on Ubuntu
name: GitLab - Ubuntu
